objects.specification: A broad, flat floor plane spanning the entire room area, featuring a subtle earth-toned texture that evokes natural stone or sandstone, providing a warm and muted foundation for the classroom environment with gentle matte finish to minimize glare.

A tall front wall painted in a warm, muted earth tone with a slightly textured plaster finish, creating a subtle natural backdrop suitable for mounting display elements and teaching equipment without harsh reflections.
A rear wall coated in a matching earth-l tone plaster with a lightly mottled surface, serving as a warm neutral backdrop for decorative posters and educational displays.
A left side wall with a natural clay-colored finish, featuring a soft matte texture that complements the classroom’s dinosaur theme and supports window and display installations.
A right side wall finished in an earthy ochre plaster with a subtle texture that harmonizes with other room surfaces and accommodates shelving or decorations as needed.
A large rectangular window with clear glass panes set into a slim, light-blue frame, designed to admit ample natural light and feature gentle bevel details that diffuse sunlight.
A pair of fabric curtains with a subtle dinosaur motif in muted greens and browns, hung from a discreet rail, featuring soft folds and slightly translucent material that filters light.
A large rectangular writing surface framed in dark wood with subtle carved dinosaur silhouettes, featuring a smooth chalkboard finish with minimal glare, suitable for writing and projection.
A sturdy teacher’s desk constructed from a rich, dark wood with a polished top surface, thick rectangular legs, hidden cable management channels, and subtle carved detailing along the edges.
A compact ceiling-mounted projector in matte white housing with ventilation grilles and a prominent lens assembly, designed to align precisely with the blackboard surface for crisp image projection.
A student desk featuring a light wood grain tabletop with rounded corners, slender metal legs in muted brown, and an easy-clean laminate finish to resist scratches and spills.

A tall wooden bookshelf in warm walnut finish, featuring five evenly spaced shelves densely packed with colorful dinosaur guidebooks, field journals, and encyclopedias, with subtle wood grain detail.
A circular wall clock with a matte ivory face, dark brown frame, and hour markers shaped like tiny dinosaur footprints, equipped with simple black hour and minute hands.
A sleek glass display case with transparent panels and slim brass framing, containing a realistic dinosaur fossil replica mounted on a minimalist stand within a controlled, dust-free interior.

A vibrant educational poster depicting dinosaur skeletal diagrams and colorful habitat illustrations, printed on semi-gloss paper and mounted flush against the wall with minimal framing.

A life-size T-Rex model made from detailed 3D mesh, featuring realistic scaly skin textures in muted browns and greens, muscular limbs, open‐mouth pose, and subtle weathering for authenticity.

A robust Triceratops model sculpted with a sturdy quadrupedal stance, featuring detailed horn and frill structures, textured hide in earthy ochre tones, and subtle shading to emphasize muscle definition.
A sleek Velociraptor model with dynamic, crouching posture, finely detailed feathers and scales in muted grays and greens, and sharp claws crafted for an agile appearance.
A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage and broad leaves, set in a round ceramic pot with a natural terracotta finish, providing a touch of organic softness to the corner.
